channel.title: Half-Mesa Blog
channel.description:
Since I have taken over 14,000 screenshots during my gaming in [b]Black Mesa [/b]and I'm a bit of a creative/arty dude by nature I've decided to make a complete set of photo composites of [b]Half-Life/Black Mesa [/b]and share the results of this experiment with anyone who cares to check it out.
I've made composites all the way through [b]We've Got Hostiles[/b] but I've only just now started uploading them to my newest blog.
Feel free to stop on by.
[url='https://halfmesa.wordpress.com/']https://halfmesa.wordpress.com/[/url]
It's been quite a lot of fun and I hope you get a kick out of my fannish excess.
Ross

item.title: Half-Mesa Blog
item.dc:creator: RossBondReturns
item.description:
Since I have taken over 14,000 screenshots during my gaming in Black Mesa and I’m a bit of a creative/arty dude by nature I’ve decided to make a complete set of photo composites of Half-Life/Black Mesa and share the results of this experiment with anyone who cares to check it out.

I’ve made composites all the way through We’ve Got Hostiles but I’ve only just now started uploading them to my newest blog.

Feel free to stop on by.

https://halfmesa.wordpress.com/

It’s been quite a lot of fun and I hope you get a kick out of my fannish excess.

Ross
